bug.author: adwellj
bug.summary: Possible typo in tf.layers.reshape API documentation
bug.description: In <denchmark-link:https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.15.3/#layers.reshape>https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.15.3/#layers.reshape</denchmark-link> , it currently states "Use the ReshapeLayerConfig field input_shape when using this layer as the first layer in a model." I'm trying 'input_shape', but that's not working. However, 'inputShape' does work. I believe that input_shape should actually be inputShape. This also seems to align with the LayerArgs interface, which ReshapeLayerArgs extends from. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-layers/blob/v0.10.3/src/engine/topology.ts#L346-353>https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-layers/blob/v0.10.3/src/engine/topology.ts#L346-353</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
